nodes.text: Larence Zaprin was a human male that lived at the time of the Galactic Civil War. He and his family lived in the Zaprin Estate in the remote mountain wilderness of Naboo.

In 1 ABY, a group of sick narglatchs and motts surrounded his home. When his children Mia and Jowres left the house, they were attacked and infected with an unknown illness. Zaprin sent an urgent request for a doctor to help his sick children. A short time later, a medic sent by the 2-1B droid Billingsly reached the Zaprin estate and managed to create an anti-toxin to cure the children. Zaprin didn't have enough money to pay the medic the full amount of credits, so he gave him a Field Surgeon Pistol to cover the remainder of the cost.

Larence Zaprin is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies who can be found in a remote building in the Nabooian mountains south-east of the Lake Retreat. He is part of the quest House Call for players of the Medic profession.
